greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1)=1; a(n)=Sum_{k=1..n-1} Stirling_1(n,k)*a(k).
comment: 2*Sum_{k>=1} a(k-1)/fallfac(n,k) = -1/n + Sum_{k>=1} (1 + a(k-1))/n^k, with the falling factorials fallfac(n,k) = Product_{j=0..k-1}(n-j). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 04 2015
link: D. Barsky, J.-P. Bézivin, p-adic Properties of Lengyel's Numbers, Journal of Integer Sequences, 17 (2014), #14.7.3. See Y_n.
maple: Y:=proc(n) option remember; local k; if n=1 then 1 else add(stirling1(n,k)*Y(k),k=1..n-1); fi; end;
mathematica: Clear[a]; a[1] = 1; a[n_] := a[n] = Sum[StirlingS1[n, k]*a[k], {k, 1, n-1}]; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 20}] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 04 2015 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 22 2014
